name: A Fox's Journey
description:
A Fox's Journey is a game made by me.

In this game you play a fox who is hunting a few chickens
and after you go through a portal you encounter new enemies!
The main feature is the ability to get the skills the enemies have! (After the 3rd Level)
Note:
Game resolution may affect rendering in a bad way
Jitter effects can be removed by activating VSync

Have fun! :D
(This Game was written for Ludum Dare 33)

(All resources were made within 48h)


To Mac User: if the Jar file doesn't work try Linux version

Update:

(25.8) Reduzed the download size

added a new version to try for MAC and LINUX

found out: I compiled to Java 8. redid it to 7 now


(a bit later now): Tested Linux Version and got it to work! :D


Update (26.08)

Fixed a bug which wasn't allowing it to start on some systems (Fixed Version) It's not necessary to download but if you want to be on the save side or it isn't working for you , you should download it



Game written in Java using LWJGL. The engine it bases of is written by me
